Topic.Title: What's with the dump in the last 20 minutes?

Message.Msg: April dip of 2011 of markets was 9% followed by mostly recovered, followed by 25% + drop into the summer. Maybe the markets are headed for a drawdown. The saying is out in May, stay away. Just think of the transfer of wealth going on through stocks, bonds, commodities, banking, government. Transfer from everyone else to 300,000 world mafia.

Message.Title: American Green Party...or Cultural Marxism
Message.Msg: It will decide the fate of the USA, and it is not at all clear which way the USA will go. Cultural Marxism will lead only to the decline of the USA. If it goes on long enough it will become a third world country. A Green Party approach would fix America's dangerous decline in the sciences, its faltering industrial power, and its budget difficulties. Large numbers of low income people belong to the ideology that supports Cultural Marxism and they use more energy and carbon intensive products per $ of their income than higher income people. So a Green agenda that taxes carbon and pollution will necessarily force a large tax burden on them. High taxes on oil, gas, and electricity would plug America's fiscal gap too, and make America's tax system less progressive and more efficient at subsidizing success in lieu of failure. In Europe the lower classes have been taught by the government to protect the environment, and fully support this approach. They are willing tax payers and contributors... It really is irrelevant if global warming is real too... People believe it pay their taxes...
